text: Christopher Polk / E! Entertainment via Getty Images Kim Kardashian poses for photos at the People's Choice Awards in November. Her interaction with Tristan Thompson as Khloe Kardashian gave birth - - just days after news broke that Thompson had cheated on Khloe - - was uncomfortable, to say the least. If Khloe Kardashian ’ s game is the revenge body, then Kim Kardashian ’ s is just straight - up revenge. As any Kardashian connoisseur will tell you, the reality TV star isn ’ t afraid to unleash on those she thinks have wronged her ― or worse, wronged anyone in her family. Enter Khloe ’ s boyfriend and NBA player Tristan Thompson, who was caught cheating on her in multiple videos days
